import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-footer", templateUrl: "./footer.component.html", styleUrls: ["./footer.component.css"], }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { constructor() {} year: number = new Date().getFullYear(); ngOnInit(): void {} changeLang(lang: any) { console.log(lang); } }
